verses.verse: Afterward<WH310> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> came,<WH3843> and said<WH559> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> "This is what Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH1639> says,<WH559> <WH5971> 'Let my people go,<WH7971> that they<WH7503> may hold a feast<WH559> to me in the wilderness.<WH4057>'"

Pharaoh<WH6547> said,<WH559> "Who is Yahweh,<WH3068> that I should listen<WH8085> to his voice<WH6963> to let Israel<WH3478> go?<WH7971> I don't<WH3045> know Yahweh,<WH3068> and moreover I will not let Israel<WH3478> go.<WH7971>"

They said,<WH559> "The God<WH430> of the Hebrews<WH5680> has met<WH7122> with us.<WH3212> Please let us go three<WH7969> days<WH3117>' journey<WH1870> into the wilderness,<WH4057> and sacrifice<WH2076> to Yahweh,<WH3068> our God,<WH430> lest he fall<WH6293> on us with pestilence,<WH1698> or with the sword.<WH2719>"
The king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> said<WH559> to them,<WH4872> "Why do you, Moses and Aaron,<WH175> take<WH6544> the people<WH5971> from their work?<WH4639> Get<WH3212> back to your burdens!<WH5450>"
Pharaoh<WH6547> said,<WH559> "Behold,<WH5971> the people of the land<WH776> are now many,<WH7227> and you make them rest<WH7673> from their burdens.<WH5450>"
The same day<WH3117> Pharaoh<WH6547> commanded<WH6680> the taskmasters<WH5065> of the people,<WH5971> and their officers,<WH7860> saying,<WH559>
"You shall no longer give<WH5414> the people<WH5971> straw<WH8401> to make<WH3835> brick,<WH3843> as before.<WH8032> Let them go<WH3212> and gather<WH7197> straw for themselves.<WH8401>

The number<WH4971> of the bricks,<WH3843> which they made<WH6213> before,<WH8032> you require<WH7760> from them.<WH1639> You shall not diminish anything of it,<WH7503> for they are idle; therefore they cry,<WH6817> saying,<WH559> <WH3212> 'Let us go and sacrifice<WH2076> to our God.<WH430>'
Let heavier work<WH5656> be laid<WH3513> on the men,<WH582> that they may labor<WH6213> therein;<WH8159> and don't let them pay any attention to lying<WH8267> words.<WH1697>"

The taskmasters<WH5065> of the people<WH5971> went out,<WH3318> and their officers,<WH7860> and they spoke<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> "This is what Pharaoh<WH6547> says:<WH559> <WH5414> 'I will not give you straw.<WH8401>
Go<WH3212> yourselves,<WH3947> get straw<WH8401> where<WH834> you can find<WH4672> it,<WH3588> for nothing<WH1697> of your work<WH5656> shall be diminished.<WH1639>'"
So the people<WH5971> were scattered abroad<WH6327> throughout all the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> to gather<WH7197> stubble<WH7179> for straw.<WH8401>
The taskmasters<WH5065> were urgent<WH213> saying,<WH559> "Fulfill<WH3615> your work<WH4639> quota<WH1697> daily,<WH3117> as when there was<WH1961> straw!<WH8401>"

The officers<WH7860> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> whom Pharaoh<WH6547>'s taskmasters<WH5065> had set<WH7760> over them,<WH5221> were beaten, and demanded,<WH559> "Why haven't<WH3615> you fulfilled your quota<WH2706> both yesterday<WH8543> and today,<WH3117> in making brick<WH3835> as before?<WH8032>"
Then the officers<WH7860> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH935> and cried<WH6817> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> saying,<WH559> "Why do you deal<WH6213> this way with your servants?<WH5650>

No straw<WH8401> is given<WH5414> to your servants,<WH5650> and they tell<WH559> us,<WH6213> 'Make brick!<WH3843>' and behold,<WH5650> your servants are beaten;<WH5221> but the fault<WH2398> is in your own people.<WH5971>"
But he said,<WH559> "You are idle!<WH7503> You are idle!<WH7503> Therefore you say,<WH559> <WH3212> 'Let us go and sacrifice<WH2076> to Yahweh.<WH3068>'
Go<WH3212> therefore now,<WH5647> and work, for no straw<WH8401> shall be given<WH5414> to you,<WH5414> yet you shall deliver the same number<WH8506> of bricks!<WH3843>"

The officers<WH7860> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> saw<WH7200> that they were in trouble,<WH7451> when it was said,<WH559> "You shall not diminish<WH1639> anything from your daily<WH3117> quota<WH1697> of bricks!<WH3843>"
They met<WH6293> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> who stood<WH5324> in the way,<WH7125> as they came out<WH3318> from Pharaoh:<WH6547>

and they said<WH559> to them,<WH3068> "May Yahweh look<WH7200> at you,<WH8199> and judge, because you have made us a stench<WH7381> to be abhorred<WH887> in the eyes<WH5869> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> and in the eyes<WH5869> of his servants,<WH5650> to put<WH5414> a sword<WH2719> in their hand<WH3027> to kill us.<WH2026>"
Moses<WH4872> returned<WH7725> to Yahweh,<WH136> and said,<WH559> "Lord,<WH136> why have you brought trouble<WH7489> on this people?<WH5971> Why is it that you have sent me?<WH7971>

For since I came<WH935> to Pharaoh<WH6547> to speak<WH1696> in your name,<WH8034> he has brought trouble<WH7489> on this people;<WH5971> neither have you delivered<WH5337> your people<WH5971> at all.<WH5337>"
